targets.expr: sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month

sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) * ($GB_Month*24) / $convert_to_GB
sum by(client_id) (rate(kafka_server_Fetch_byte_rate{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(client_id) (rate(kafka_server_Produce_byte_rate{client_id=~"$producer_client_id", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(topic, partition) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic",partition=~"$partition"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month

sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", topic=~"$topic", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
count(kafka_server_ReplicaManager_Value{job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", name="LeaderCount"}) * $GB_Month
sum(rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name="BytesInPerSec", job="kafka-broker", env="$env", instance=~"b-1.monitoringmsk.wlkexu.c18.kafka.us-east-1.amazonaws.com"}[1m])) / 1024 / 1024
sum(rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name="BytesOutPerSec", job="kafka-broker", env="$env", instance=~"b-1.monitoringmsk.wlkexu.c18.kafka.us-east-1.amazonaws.com"}[1m])) / 1024 / 1024
sum(rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name="BytesOutPerSec", job="kafka-broker", env="$env", cluster="$cluster"}[1m])) / $convert_to_GB
count(count by(client_id) (kafka_server_Fetch_byte_rate{client_id!~"^consumer-amazon.msk.*"})) + count(count by(client_id) (kafka_server_Produce_byte_rate{client_id!~"^producer-.*"}))
sum(kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value{name="GlobalPartitionCount", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by(topic, partition) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic",partition=~"$partition"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum(kafka_controller_KafkaController_Value{name="GlobalTopicCount", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"})
count(kafka_server_ReplicaManager_Value{job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", name="LeaderCount"})
sum by(cluster) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", cluster=~"monitoring-msk", env="dev"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(client_id) (rate(kafka_server_Fetch_byte_rate{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(client_id) (rate(kafka_server_Produce_byte_rate{client_id=~"$producer_client_id", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month

sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) * (30*24) / $convert_to_GB
sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", instance=~"$instance", env="dev", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) * $GB_Month
sum by(instance) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB
sum by(partition, topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic",partition=~"$partition"}[1h]))/$convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(partition, topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", instance=~"$instance", env=~"dev", topic=~"$topic",partition=~"$partition"}[1h]))/$convert_to_GB

sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", topic=~"$topic", instance=~"$instance"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicAggregatedMetrics_Value{name="RemoteLogSizeBytes", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic"}[1h])) * $GB_Month
sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB / $GB_Month
sum by(topic) (rate(kafka_log_Log_Value{name="Size", job="kafka-broker", env="dev", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic"}[1h])) / $convert_to_GB
